markdownRemark.html: Kubernetes (commonly stylized as k8s) is an open-source container orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

frontmatter.title: Kubernetes, an humble introduction
frontmatter.excerpt: Kubernetes became in a few years the reference orchestrator. After having supplanted Swarm, the solution remains the leader against its competitors. Behind the hype, we have to understand what Kubernetes enable to our organisation and why its adoption is crucial.
frontmatter.author: romain-dary
